alert.note: Alert for Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 11:00PM EST until January 29 at 11:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Somerset County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Limit time outside. Dress in layers and cover exposed skin. Wear a hat and gloves. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken. Review winter weather safety and preparedness information at weather.gov/winter. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
